summary: Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth, the lives of the living are in danger.
cast: Gregory Walcott|Mona McKinnon|Duke Moore|Tom Keene|Carl Anthony|Paul Marco|Tor Johnson|Dudley Manlove|Joanna Lee|John Breckinridge|Lyle Talbot|David De Mering|Norma McCarty|Bill Ash|Lynn Lemon|Ben Frommer|Gloria Dea|Conrad Brooks|Maila Nurmi|Bela Lugosi|Criswell|Donald A. Davis|Johnny Duncan|Karl Johnson|Tom Mason|J. Edward Reynolds|Pauline Reynolds|Clay Stone|Hugh Thomas Jr.|Edward D. Wood Jr.
title: Vampiros del espacio
